summary: This bill, the "More Funding for COPS Act", aims to reauthorize the public safety and community policing grant program established under the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968. It specifically amends the Act to increase funding for the COPS ON THE BEAT grant program, replacing the previous funding amounts for 2006-2009 with increased amounts for fiscal years 2026-2030. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
